features: Sulfate-Free Conditioner For Blonde Hair: This blonde hair conditioner is exceptionally gentle on colored hair, and is specially formulated to help neutralize the look of brassiness and balance blonde hair with total system

Blonde Conditioner With Iris Botanicals: Sulfate Free formula with Purple Iris extracts, EverPure Blonde System neutralizes brassiness and hydrates over-processed hair, restoring shine and protecting your color
The EverPure Blonde System: For best results, use EverPure Blonde shampoo and conditioner in tandem, for a gentle cleansing hair care system that balances blonde hair and neutralizes brassiness

Why Sulfate Free: Sulfates are cleansing agents that help breakdown oil, dirt, and build up on the scalp and hair; But some sulfates can be harsh and stripping; Our sulfate-free shampoos and conditioners are non-stripping and made for color-treated hair
Complete The Look: Try with EverPure Purple Shampoo and Conditioner every 2-3 days for further reduced brassiness
body.description: L'Oreal Paris EverPure Blonde sulfate free conditioner with iris neutralizes brassiness in just 1 use*. Deeply hydrates over-processed or damaged hair for pure shine and a soft, luxurious touch. Our formulas are especially gentle on color treated hair. There are no harsh sulfates, salts or surfactants that can strip, dull and damage hair. Experience a purely sensorial rich, creamy formula and a fresh aromatic fragrance that blooms. • Neutralizes Brassiness • Sulfate Free • Anti-Fade • Iris Botanicals *system of shampoo, conditioner, and treatment banishes by neutralizing brassiness After using EverPure Blonde shampoo, apply to wet hair and massage gently. Leave on for 1-2 minutes. Rinse. Use EverPure Blonde Shade Reviving Treatment once weekly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Been using this for years. My hair gets washed every day and this keeps it soft and the gray clear (not yellowy). Use the matching shampoo too. Like that it’s sulfate free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Removed Brassiness in One Use
reviews.reviewText: I started box dyeing my hair 6 months ago with the L'oreal box dyes - each time has been a different ash shade from their line. I was noticing so much brassiness from my regular conditioners. I was scared to use a blonde consirionwe because I have wavy hair prone to dryness, but after using my usual conditioner unfortunately I noticed so much brassiness developing so I tried this. I applied this today and the difference is like day and night. I cannot believe how much brass has been removed from my hair - it's the perfect ash like the box without the auburn tones I had before. I love the smell too - it reminds me of my lavender body lotion. And it's not drying at all. Will definitely re-buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works well after swimming to keep hair under control. Best I have found yet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Mom loves this Stuff
reviews.reviewText: My mom is a bottle blond (don't tell her I told you). She loves this stuff swears by it. However of late she finds it hard to find in stores. So we ordered it online. It's cheaper less hassle thank looking and comes right to the house win-win

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long used product
reviews.reviewText: My hair is gray now but I was blonde. By using this shampoo & conditioner brand my hair looks a bit brighter than dirty dishpan water. Gives it a blonde hint. Love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2020
reviews.reviewText: My naturally blonde hair with a red undertone was no longer cooperating with my wheat tone color. Hated the result I was getting. I used Brass Banisher, which did the immediate trick, but I knew follow through would be necessary. So I bought this, and it keeps things as they ought to be. The brassiness is gone. One word of advice: it says just to work the shampoo into a nice lather and rinse. The first time--a bit of red was creeping through. The second washing, I left it on 3 minutes, and I was back to where I wanted to be. So for more stubborn brass, leave this on for a bit. I wouldn't leave it on longer than 3 minutes because I am not sure what would happen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Gets the job done if you want more of a golden orange tone, but way too drying.
reviews.reviewText: It's a bit drying for my taste, but I have really curly course 3C/4A hair, which soaks up all mosture applied to it in a matter of seconds. I should have taken those reviews that promised moisture lightly not knowing their hair types. I had to go heavily on my regular conditioner after washing this out, to prevent my hair from dying of thurst. It has a lavender smell which is a fragrance to each it's own, doesn't bother me, but I know some of the other reviews mentioned a smell... definitely adds that orange tone to your hair if that's what you're looking for, but be careful, it ended up turning my darker blondes a little too orange/gold for my liking and not really doing much to the ligher blondes which I wanted to bring down a notch. I want to give it another go and will try to post a photo of my hair afterwards, to show what I mean about my need for moisture. I decided to go with this after reading reviews on other products and they all seem to be really drying, I guess it comes with the territory, but this seemed to be the least drying of them all. If you have very course 3C or any 4 type hair I suggest pairing this with a conditioner that gives your hair what it needs or even doing a co-wash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very good shampoo = Have used it for years
Hasta ahorita si me gusta mucho! Tenía cabellos como naranjas después de la decoloración y el shampoo y acondicionador me ayuda muchísimo a que se vayan desvaneciendo poco a poco !

This was the only blonde blue/purple shampoo&conditioner I could find free of everything and approved by my stylist for use after I had tannioplastia done on my hair. It does help tone a little but not the best. And it smells awful.
Compre el shampoo y el acondicionador y me encantaron, te dejan el cabello suave y el aroma está muy rico
